SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM') || '01' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL( ( SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(pat_code,-3))) FROM tb_patient WHERE pat_code LIKE TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYMM')||'%'),0)+1, '000') ) FROM dual
/* insertPat */ INSERT INTO tb_patient ( pat_code , pat_name , pat_tel , pat_ihidnum , pat_brthdy , pat_gen_code , pat_addr , pat_dtl_addr , pat_zip , pat_first_date , pat_last_date , pat_frgnr_yn ) VALUES ( #{patCode} , #{patName} , #{patTel} , #{patIhidnum} , CASE WHEN substr(#{patIhidnum},8,1) = '1' or substr(#{patIhidnum},8,1) = '2' THEN '19'||substr(#{patIhidnum},0,6) ELSE '20'||substr(#{patIhidnum},0,6) END , CASE WHEN substr(#{patIhidnum},8,1) = '1' or substr(#{patIhidnum},8,1) = '3' THEN 'M' ELSE 'F' END , #{patAddr} , #{patDtlAddr} ,#{patZip} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , CASE WHEN substr(#{patIhidnum},8,1) in ('1','2','3','4') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END )
mapper.select: /* selectPats */ SELECT pat_code , pat_name , pat_tel , pat_ihidnum , pat_brthdy , pat_gen_code , pat_addr , pat_dtl_addr , pat_zip , pat_first_date , pat_last_date , pat_frgnr_yn , pat_hsptlz_status FROM tb_patient

/* selectByCode */ SELECT pat_code , pat_name , pat_tel , pat_ihidnum , pat_brthdy , pat_gen_code , pat_addr , pat_dtl_addr , pat_zip , pat_first_date , pat_last_date , pat_frgnr_yn , pat_hsptlz_status FROM tb_patient WHERE pat_code = #{patCode}

/* selectByName */ SELECT pat_code , pat_name , pat_tel , pat_ihidnum , pat_brthdy , pat_gen_code , pat_addr , pat_dtl_addr , pat_zip , pat_first_date , pat_last_date , pat_frgnr_yn , pat_hsptlz_status FROM tb_patient WHERE pat_name LIKE '%'|| #{patName} ||'%'
